title: Goodness people are so toxic in this game

replies.body: Yeah I probably should just start muting. I generally don't like to just in case they actually say something relevant to the game but the chance of that happening seems to be getting less and less lately.
lmao what you have to do to chronically mess this mans head up to make him add you and go full 5th grade grammar on your ass

I don't even know haha. I went 4/7/6 but I mean that's not the worst I have ever done or anywhere near the worst I have ever seen. It was a bad game for me but I didn't know I was causing him to lose any game he has ever played haha.
you hit that mans trigger switch real quick
Mute everyone in the game. No toxicity until postgame chat. I hope the new client carries over the /mute all function into postgame chat.
I keep saying, /mute all is the most OP thing in this game. With the new smart pings, there's absolutely no reason to trade a single word with anybody anymore.
Yeah It's looking like that's the best option lately. I don't like it too much cause I might miss something important but it would be better to see mindless toxicity all the time.

Honestly, due to the amount of toxicity from the community, I have the immediate assumption that everyone in the game, or the very vast majority of this community is toxic. 

It's a bad assumption, but after 5 years of dealing with this toxic ingame community on a very near daily basis, I lost my tolerance for the community pretty much and started muting every single game. I normally see how toxic the game is at the postgame chat, and sadly, I see much more toxic postgame chat than silence this season. The community has definitely gotten worse since last season and has gotten exponentially worse since I started back in 2011.
LOL THE COMEBACKS. I couldn't do that xD that's why i insta /Mute now

I don't generally like mute because I like to see just in case they actually say something pertinent to the game. So instead I will usually just stay silent and don't generally talk in game but I might have to start doing it because usually I don't care but 40 straight minutes of it does start rubbing me the wrong way.

This game is losing player and getting rid of players. I think they should stop perma banning people, in the last 4yrs I been playing I seen over 30 people get perma banned, my teams best mid player just got perma banned he spent a lot of money on this game which supports Riot and helps them pay their employee's and fund their charity program. Now he wont come back no matter how much we beg him. He doesnt want to grind out the long dreadful 30 levels and get all his runes and whatever. So, it stinks for us. I understand why he got banned because he was negative but in reality people should make better use of their mute or Riot should remove talking before it removes players. I have never been able to type and play anyways so I dont see the problem with it. When your highly invested in something your more likely to stick around so in a sense by perma banning these folks they are setting them free lol. Thats a bad buisness move, hopefully Riot generates all the income it needs from other things besides players buying things.
